attributes.action: UK Govt should immediately implement strong steps to contain COVID19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
Not taking prompt action will be catastrophic for UK and it could end up in a state like Italy and a large number of UK citizens could get infected and die.

The mortality rate is not very accurate as observed in Italy where large number of people are infected, critical and died.

People of UK are very worried and fear for their life and feel the government's approach so far has been mild

The people of UK demand the government to immediately implement aggressive steps to contain COVID19 in UK
attributes.background: WHO has declared the COVID19 outbreak a pandemic and UK should implement immediate aggressive steps like sealing borders, banning large events, shutting down public places like Cinemas, public transport, encouraging work from home etc. like many other countries to avoid the spread of the virus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301397

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
